title: Kjør meg til OL
overview: In the new program Kjør meg til OL Magnus Devold, without a driving licence, travels from Norway to South Korea in an attempt to arrive in time for the opening of the Pyeongchang Olympics. However, the 20,000-kilometre-long drive becomes a travel program out of the ordinary with assistance from the various people he encounters during his journey. Is Magnus able to persuade enough people to transport him to Pyeongchang on time?
